description:
In Spicy Pack you get up to 10+ hours of new gameplay, more flirting and pics thanks to 80 new levels and 8 new girls:

- genuine milf Lilian
- big breast store worker Alyson
- innocent blondie Summer
- eloquent brunette Nellie
- tough girl Clayton
- 3 breast Clara
- tattooed Nadia
- Santa's helper Charlotte

Which one will become your waifu? ;)
name: Eroblast: Spicy Pack
